translation.zh: 顺便提一下， 防止人口爆炸性增长的最好方法就是 让全世界人接受更多教育 变得更健康。

translation.en: In 2010,  we had just short of two billion people  online, connected.
translation.zh: 在2010年， 我们有接近20亿的人 与网络连接。

translation.en: By 2020,  that's going from two billion to five billion  Internet users.
translation.zh: 到2020年， 英特网用户将会从20亿 增长到50亿。

translation.en: Three billion new minds  who have never been heard from before  are connecting to the global conversation.
translation.zh: 30亿未曾 被注意的新用户。 将参与到这全球的对话中来。

translation.en: What will these people want?
translation.zh: 他们想要什么？

translation.en: What will they consume? What will they desire?
translation.zh: 他们将会消费什么？他们的愿望是什么？

translation.en: And rather than having economic shutdown,  we're about to have the biggest economic injection ever.
translation.zh: 我们将迎来的是最大的， 是经济活力的注入而不是衰退。

translation.en: These people represent  tens of trillions of dollars  injected into the global economy.
translation.zh: 这些人代表着 几十万亿美元的消费力 将会注入全球经济体。

translation.en: And they will get healthier  and they'll become better educated by using the Khan Academy,  3D printing and infinite computing  [become] more productive than ever before.
translation.zh: 他们会因为使用手持移动分析仪 而更健康， 也会因为观看Khan Academy变得更有聪慧， 随着3D打印和无限计算 的普及而变得比以往 任何时代都更有生产力。

translation.en: So what could three billion rising,  healthy, educated, productive members of humanity  bring to us?
translation.zh: 30亿健康，接受教育， 富有生产力的人类社会成员 能为我们带来什么？

translation.en: How about a set of voices that have never been heard from before.
translation.zh: 一系列我们从未接触过的新思维。

translation.en: What about giving the oppressed,  wherever they might be,  the voice to be heard and the voice to act  for the first time ever?
translation.zh: 还有给予受到压制的， 或者其他困难的 人们首次获得受到关注 和帮助的机会。

translation.en: What will these three billion people bring?
translation.zh: 这30亿人会带来什么？

translation.en: What about contributions we can't even predict?
translation.zh: 或许是我们都还未能预见的贡献？

translation.en: The one thing I've learned at the X Prize  driven by their passion with a clear focus  can do extraordinary things,  things that large corporations and governments  could only do in the past.
translation.zh: 我在筹办X大赛的过程中体会到的一点是 目标清晰，富有激情的 小型团队就能取得 卓越的成就， 在过去只有大企业和政府 才能做到的事情。

translation.en: Let me share and close with a story  that really got me excited.
translation.zh: 让我来分享一个故事作为结尾， 这个故事让我非常兴奋。

translation.en: There is a program that some of you might have heard of.
translation.zh: 在座的有一些可能听说过这个项目。

translation.en: It's a game called Foldit.
translation.zh: 是一个叫做Foldit的游戏。

translation.en: It came out of the University of Washington in Seattle.
translation.zh: 它来自西雅图的华盛顿大学。

translation.en: And this is a game  where individuals can actually take a sequence of amino acids  and figure out how the protein is going to fold.
translation.zh: 它是一个 能让个人获取一个氨基酸序列， 并分析出其中的蛋白质是如何折叠的。

translation.en: And how it folds dictates its structure and its functionality.
translation.zh: 其折叠的方式决定了该氨基酸的结构和功能。

translation.en: And it's very important for research in medicine.
translation.zh: 这是非常重要的医学研究。

translation.en: And up until now, it's been a supercomputer problem.
translation.zh: 直到目前，这都还是一个由超级电脑来处理的问题。

translation.en: And this game has been played  by university professors and so forth.
translation.zh: 这个游戏起先 是给大学教授玩。

translation.en: And it's literally, hundreds of thousands of people  came online and started playing it.
translation.zh: 然后成百上千的人也上线 开始玩这个游戏。

translation.en: And it showed that, in fact, today,  the human pattern recognition machinery  is better at folding proteins than the best computers.
translation.zh: 它也展示出时至今日， 人类的模式辨识机能 仍然要比最好的电脑都要强。

translation.en: And when these individuals went and looked  at who was the best protein folder in the world,  it wasn't an MIT professor,  it wasn't a CalTech student,  it was a person from England, from Manchester,  a woman who, during the day,  was an executive assistant at a rehab clinic  and, at night, was the world's best protein folder.
translation.zh: 当大家排列出最好的 蛋白质折叠专家时， 并不是MIT的教授， 也不是加州理工学院的学生， 而是一位来自曼彻斯特的英国女性。 白天在一家康复治疗整所 行政助理的工作， 而夜晚也是全世界最好的蛋白质折叠专家。

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen,  what gives me tremendous confidence  in the future  is the fact that we are now more empowered as individuals  to take on the grand challenges of this planet.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 给予我对未来 巨大信心的， 是我们每一位作为个人都被赋予 挑战全世界面临的难题的能力。

translation.en: We have the tools with this exponential technology.
translation.zh: 我们拥有快速发展的科技和工具，

translation.en: We have the passion of the DIY innovator.
translation.zh: 也有DIY发明家的激情。

translation.en: We have the capital of the techno-philanthropist.
translation.zh: 大家都有能力成为技术－慈善家。

translation.en: And we have three billion new minds  coming online to work with us  to solve the grand challenges,  to do that which we must do.
translation.zh: 同时还有30亿新的用户 来到线上与我们合作 一起解决巨大的挑战， 做到我们必须要做的事情。

translation.en: We are living into extraordinary decades ahead.
translation.zh: 我们正要迎来卓越的几十年。

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家。

translation.en: I'm going to speak  about a tiny, little idea.
translation.zh: 我要讲的是 一个很小概念

translation.en: And this is about shifting baseline.
translation.zh: 与基准线的变动有关

translation.en: And because the idea can be explained in one minute,  I will tell you three stories before  to fill in the time.
translation.zh: 这个概念一分钟就能讲完了 所以我先讲三个故事 来混时间

translation.en: And the first story  is about Charles Darwin, one of my heroes.
translation.zh: 第一个故事 讲的是达尔文 我的偶像之一

translation.en: And he was here, as you well know, in '35.
translation.zh: 他曾来过这里 大家都知道 那是1935年

translation.en: And you'd think he was chasing finches,  but he wasn't.
translation.zh: 你们可能以为他在追鸟雀 其实不是

translation.en: He was actually collecting fish.
translation.zh: 他是在捕鱼

translation.en: And he described one of them  as very "common."
translation.zh: 他说一条鱼 很”常见“

translation.en: This was the sailfin grouper.
translation.zh: 这是一种石斑鱼

translation.en: A big fishery was run on it  until the '80s.
translation.zh: 这种鱼被大量捕捉 到八十年代

translation.en: Now the fish is on the IUCN Red List.
translation.zh: 现在 这种鱼已经被列入国际自然保护联盟的红色名录

translation.en: Now this story,  we have heard it lots of times  on Galapagos and other places,  so there is nothing particular about it.
translation.zh: 这个故事 我们已经听过很多遍了 在加拉帕戈斯群岛和其他地方都听过 没什么新鲜的

translation.en: But the point is, we still come to Galapagos.
translation.zh: 问题在于 我们现在还会去加拉帕戈斯群岛

translation.en: We still think it is pristine.
translation.zh: 还认为那是还是原生态

translation.en: The brochures still say  it is untouched.
translation.zh: 旅游宣传册上还说 这里未经开发

translation.en: So what happens here?
translation.zh: 这里究竟是什么情况

translation.en: The second story, also to illustrate another concept,  is called shifting waistline.
translation.zh: 第二个故事 讲的是另一个概念 叫做变动的"腰准线"

translation.en: Because I was there in '71,  studying a lagoon in West Africa.
translation.zh: （众人笑） 1971年的时候 我在那里 考察西非的一片西湖

translation.en: I was there because I grew up in Europe  and I wanted later to work in Africa.
translation.zh: 我去那里是因为我在欧洲长大 我想以后到非洲工作

translation.en: And I thought I could blend in.
translation.zh: 我以为我可以融入当地社会

translation.en: And I got a big sunburn,  and I was convinced that I was really not from there.
translation.zh: 我还被晒伤了一大块 结果我发现我的确不是非洲来的

translation.en: This was my first sunburn.
translation.zh: 那是我第一次被晒伤

translation.en: And the lagoon  was surrounded by palm trees,  as you can see, and a few mangrove.
translation.zh: 这片泻湖 被棕榈树环绕 你们可以看到一些红树

translation.en: And it had tilapia  about 20 centimeters,  a species of tilapia called blackchin tilapia.
translation.zh: 这里有罗非鱼 大概20厘米长 这种罗非鱼叫黑颚罗非鱼

translation.en: And the fisheries for this tilapia  sustained lots of fish and they had a good time  and they earned more than average  in Ghana.
translation.zh: 人们捕捞罗非鱼 这让许多鱼存活了下来 它们活得很好 渔业的收入在加纳 高出平均水平

translation.en: When I went there 27 years later,  the fish had shrunk to half of their size.
translation.zh: 二十七年之后 我回到那里 这种鱼的大小缩减了一半

translation.en: They were maturing at five centimeters.
translation.zh: 它们成年时只有五厘米长

translation.en: They had been pushed genetically.
translation.zh: 它们的发育在遗传上被改变了

translation.en: There were still fishes.
translation.zh: 那里还有鱼

translation.en: They were still kind of happy.
translation.zh: 它们还是活得不错

translation.en: And the fish also were happy to be there.
translation.zh: 鱼儿们也很喜欢生活在那里

translation.en: So nothing has changed,  but everything has changed.
translation.zh: 似乎没什么变化 但其实 一切都改变了

translation.en: My third little story  is that I was an accomplice  in the introduction of trawling  in Southeast Asia.
translation.zh: 第三个故事讲的是 将拖网捕捞 引入非洲东南部的 有我一份

translation.en: In the '70s -- well, beginning in the '60s --  Europe did lots of development projects.
translation.zh: 在七十年代--其实是六十年代初期-- 欧洲进行了许多发展项目

translation.en: Fish development  meant imposing on countries  that had already 100,000 fishers  to impose on them industrial fishing.
translation.zh: 渔业发展 意味着强迫 渔民人数在达十万人的国家 进行工业捕鱼

translation.en: And this boat, quite ugly,  is called the Mutiara 4.
translation.zh: 这艘船 挺难看的 叫Mutiara 4号

translation.en: And I went sailing on it,  and we did surveys  throughout the southern South China sea  and especially the Java Sea.
translation.zh: 我乘上这艘船 我们一路做调查 沿着中国南海 尤其是爪哇海

translation.en: And what we caught,  we didn't have words for it.
translation.zh: 我们捕捞到了 叫不出名字的东西

translation.en: What we caught, I know now,  is the bottom of the sea.
translation.zh: 现在我知道了 我们捞到的 是海底的生物

translation.en: And 90 percent of our catch  were sponges,  other animals that are fixed on the bottom.
translation.zh: 百分之九十 是海绵 以及其他固定在海底的动物

translation.en: And actually most of the fish,  they are a little spot on the debris,  the piles of debris, were coral reef fish.
translation.zh: 实际上 大多数鱼 就是那堆杂物中的小点 它们是生活在珊瑚礁中的鱼

translation.en: Essentially the bottom of the sea came onto the deck  and then was thrown down.
translation.zh: 海底被端上了甲板 后来又被扔下去

translation.en: And these pictures are extraordinary  because this transition is very rapid.
translation.zh: 这些照片意义非凡 因为这个变化过程非常快

translation.en: Within a year, you do a survey  and then commercial fishing begins.
translation.zh: 不到一年 你再进行调查 接着渔业又开始了

translation.en: The bottom is transformed  from, in this case, a hard bottom or soft coral  into a muddy mess.
translation.zh: 海底发生了变化 坚硬的海底或柔软的珊瑚 变成了一滩泥泞

translation.en: This is a dead turtle.
translation.zh: 这是一只死了的海龟

translation.en: They were not eaten, they were thrown away because they were dead.
translation.zh: 它们没有被吃掉 而是因为死了而被扔掉的

translation.en: And one time we caught a live one.
translation.zh: 有一次 我们捉到一只活的

translation.en: It was not drowned yet.
translation.zh: 它还没有淹死

translation.en: And then they wanted to kill it because it was good to eat.
translation.zh: 他们想杀掉它 因为海龟肉很美味

translation.en: This mountain of debris  is actually collected by fishers  into an area that's never been fished.
translation.zh: 这堆积如山的杂物 是渔民们捞上来的 他们每次进入未经捕捞的海域 都能捞到这些东西

translation.en: But it's not documented.
translation.zh: 而这并没有被记录在案

translation.en: We transform the world,  but we don't remember it.
translation.zh: 我们改变了世界 但却不认账

translation.en: We adjust our baseline  to the new level,  and we don't recall what was there.
translation.zh: 我们把基准线 调整到一个新水平 而把之前的水平抛在脑后

translation.en: If you generalize this,  something like this happens.
translation.zh: 归纳一下 就会出现这样的情况

translation.en: You have on the y axis some good thing:  biodiversity, numbers of orca,  the greenness of your country, the water supply.
translation.zh: Y轴代表美好的事物 生物多样性 逆戟鲸的数量 你的国家的绿化 水资源供应

translation.en: And over time it changes --  it changes  because people do things, or naturally.
translation.zh: 随着时间的变化而变化 之所以变化 是因为人们的活动或自然的变化

translation.en: Every generation  will use the images  that they got at the beginning of their conscious lives  as a standard  and will extrapolate forward.
translation.zh: 每代人 都会 以他们有意识之初的画面 作为标准 并往前推测

translation.en: And the difference then,  they perceive as a loss.
translation.zh: 所产生的差距 他们视为一种损失

translation.en: But they don't perceive what happened before as a loss.
translation.zh: 但他们没有把之前发生的事情视为一种损失

translation.en: You can have a succession of changes.
translation.zh: 一系列变化发生了

translation.en: At the end you want to sustain  miserable leftovers.
translation.zh: 最后你希望 保住最后可怜的幸存者

translation.en: And that, to a large extent, is what we want to do now.
translation.zh: 而这在很大程度上 就是我们现在要做的

translation.en: We want to sustain things that are gone  or things that are not the way they were.
translation.zh: 我们想要保护那些消失殆尽的东西 或者那些发生了变化的东西

translation.en: Now one should think  this problem affected people certainly when in predatory societies,  they killed animals  after a few generations.
translation.zh: 现在人们应当认为 这个问题当然会对人产生影响 他们捕杀动物 而直到几代人之后

translation.en: Because, obviously,  an animal that is very abundant,  before it gets extinct,  it becomes rare.
translation.zh: 才意识到他们的所作所为 因为 很显然 在一种动物灭绝 或濒临灭绝前 这种动物的数量还是很多的

translation.en: So you don't lose abundant animals.
translation.zh: 所以你不会失去数量多的动物物种

translation.en: You always lose rare animals.
translation.zh: 你失去的是珍稀动物

translation.en: And therefore they're not perceived  as a big loss.
translation.zh: 所以这些动物的消失 不会被视为重大损失

translation.en: Over time,  we concentrate on large animals,  and in a sea that means the big fish.
translation.zh: 随着时间推移 我们关注大型动物 在海洋中 这指的是大型鱼类

translation.en: They become rarer because we fish them.
translation.zh: 我们捕捞鱼类致使它们的数量越来越少

translation.en: Over time we have a few fish left  and we think this is the baseline.
translation.zh: 一段时间时候 我们只剩下少数鱼了 我们就把这个数量看做基准线

translation.en: And the question is,  why do people accept this?
translation.zh: 问题是 人们为什么对此安之若素呢

translation.en: Well because they don't know that it was different.
translation.zh: 这是因为他们不知道情况变化了

translation.en: And in fact, lots of people, scientists,  will contest that it was really different.
translation.zh: 事实上 许多人 尤其是科学家 反对这种意见

translation.en: And they will contest this  because the evidence  presented in an earlier mode  is not in the way  they would like the evidence presented.
translation.zh: 他们反对 是因为 早前的分析模型中所呈现的证据方式 并不是 他们想要的呈现方式

translation.en: For example,  the anecdote that some present,  as Captain so-and-so  observed lots of fish in this area  cannot be used  or is usually not utilized by fishery scientists,  because it's not "scientific."
translation.zh: 举个例子 有人讲了一个故事 说某某船长 发现这个地区有很多鱼 这个故事不能拿来当证据 渔业科学家通常也不会采纳这个故事 因为它不够“科学”

translation.en: So you have a situation  where people don't know the past,  even though we live in literate societies,  because they don't trust  the sources of the past.
translation.zh: 这就造成了一个情况： 人们对过去一无所知 尽管 我们生活在文明社会中 因为他们不相信 关于过去的信息来源

translation.en: And hence, the enormous role  that a marine protected area can play.
translation.zh: 他们也不了解 一个海洋保护区域的重大角色

translation.en: Because with marine protected areas,  we actually recreate the past.
translation.zh: 因为 我们实际上是通过海洋保护区 来重塑过去

translation.en: We recreate the past that people cannot conceive  because the baseline has shifted  and is extremely low.
translation.zh: 我们重塑了过去 让人们无法设想过去的情况 因为基准线变动了 变得极低

translation.en: That is for people  who can see a marine protected area  and who can benefit  from the insight that it provides,  which enables them to reset their baseline.
translation.zh: 这适用于 那些看到一片海洋保护区的人 和那些 从其中的深层意义获益的人 这让他们有能力重置他们的基准线

translation.en: How about the people who can't do that  because they have no access --  the people in the Midwest for example?
translation.zh: 那么那些没有能力这么做的人呢 他们没法知道 例如中西部地区的人们

translation.en: There I think  that the arts and film  can perhaps fill the gap,  and simulation.
translation.zh: 我想 艺术作品和电影 可以填补这个空缺 还有原态模拟

translation.en: This is a simulation of Chesapeake Bay.
translation.zh: 这是切萨皮克湾的原态模拟

translation.en: There were gray whales in Chesapeake Bay a long time ago --  500 years ago.
translation.zh: 很久以前 有灰鲸生活在切萨皮克湾 那是五百年前

translation.en: And you will have noticed that the hues and tones  are like "Avatar."
translation.zh: 你会注意到上面的色调 酷似“阿凡达”

translation.en: And if you think about "Avatar,"  if you think of why people were so touched by it --  never mind the Pocahontas story --  why so touched by the imagery?
translation.zh: （众人笑） 一想到“阿凡达” 一想到人们为何会为之动容 风中奇缘的故事就不说了 为何人们会被里面的画面所打动

translation.en: Because it evokes something  that in a sense has been lost.
translation.zh: 这是因为它激发了 我们遗失了的某样东西

translation.en: And so my recommendation,  it's the only one I will provide,  is for Cameron to do "Avatar II" underwater.
translation.zh: 我建议 这也是我唯一的建议 希望卡梅隆的“阿凡达2”能在水下拍摄

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢大家

translation.en: Hi. I'm Kevin Allocca, I'm the trends manager at YouTube,  and I professionally watch YouTube videos.
translation.zh: 你好。 我是凯文·阿劳卡。 我是YouTube的趋势分析经理， 而我的专业就是观看YouTube视频。

translation.en: It's true.
translation.zh: 这是真的。

translation.en: So we're going to talk a little bit today about how videos go viral  and then why that even matters.
translation.zh: 所以今天我们要讨论一下为什么一些视频会风靡 甚至会变得重要。

translation.en: We all want to be stars --  celebrities, singers, comedians --  and when I was younger, that seemed so very, very hard to do.
translation.zh: 我们都想成为明星 -- 名人， 歌手， 喜剧演员 -- 而当我年轻时，这是非常，非常难办到的。

translation.en: But now Web video has made it  so that any of us or any of the creative things that we do  can become completely famous  in a part of our world's culture.
translation.zh: 不过现在网络视频让它成真 所以我们任何人都可以发挥创意做想做的事 然后瞬间成名 成为世界文化的一部分。

translation.en: Any one of you could be famous on the Internet  by next Saturday.
translation.zh: 你们任何人都可在网络成名 就在下周六。

translation.en: But there are over 48 hours of video uploaded to YouTube  every minute.
translation.zh: 不过每分钟有超过48小时的视频 上传到YouTube。

translation.en: And of that, only a tiny percentage  ever goes viral and gets tons of views and becomes a cultural moment.
translation.zh: 在众多中， 仅有极小比率 会风靡及得到万人收看率，并成为一种霎时文化。

translation.en: So how does it happen?
translation.zh: 这又是怎么产生呢？

translation.en: Three things:  tastemakers, communities of participation  and unexpectedness.
translation.zh: 三要素： 时髦开创者，社区参与 还有意想不到。

translation.en: All right, let's go.
translation.zh: 好的，让我们看看。

translation.en: Bear Vasquez: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 熊先生· 瓦斯奎兹： 噢，我的老天。噢，我的上帝。

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 噢，我的上帝！

translation.en: Wooo!
translation.zh: 呜！

translation.en: Ohhhhh, wowwww!
translation.zh: 噢，哇塞！

translation.en: KA: Last year, Bear Vasquez posted this video  that he had shot outside his home in Yosemite National Park.
translation.zh: KA: 去年，熊先生 · 瓦斯奎兹上传了这视频 就在他优胜美地公园的住家外拍摄的。

translation.en: In 2010, it was viewed 23 million times.
translation.zh: 在2010年，这部视频被观看了两千三百万次。

translation.en: This is a chart of what it looked like  when it first became popular last summer.
translation.zh: (笑声） 这张图表显示了 这部视频刚在夏末流行的状况。

translation.en: But he didn't actually set out to make a viral video, Bear.
translation.zh: 不过熊先生并没有要拍风靡视频的意向。

translation.en: He just wanted to share a rainbow.
translation.zh: 他只是想要分享一条彩虹

translation.en: Because that's what you do when your name is Yosemite Mountain Bear.
translation.zh: 因为这正是自称“优胜美地山熊”的人会做的事。

translation.en: And he had posted lots of nature videos in fact.
translation.zh: 他还上传了许多自然景观的视频。

translation.en: And this video had actually been posted  all the way back in January.
translation.zh: 这视频实际上在 去年一月就上传了。

translation.en: So what happened here?
translation.zh: 所以之间到底是发生了什么事？

translation.en: Jimmy Kimmel actually.
translation.zh: 就是吉米·吉梅尔。

translation.en: Jimmy Kimmel posted this tweet  that would eventually propel the video to be as popular as it would become.
translation.zh: 吉米·吉梅尔一则推文 推波助澜让这个视频大受欢迎。

translation.en: Because tastemakers like Jimmy Kimmel  introduce us to new and interesting things  and bring them to a larger audience.
translation.zh: 因为有像吉米·吉梅尔这种潮流先锋 为我们介绍新颖又有趣的事物 从而让观众接触到这些事物。

translation.en: Rebecca Black: ♫ It's Friday, Friday. Gotta get down on Friday. ♫  ♫ Everybody's looking forward to the weekend, weekend. ♫  ♫ Friday, Friday. Gettin' down on Friday. ♫  KA: So you didn't think that we could actually have this conversation  without talking about this video I hope.
translation.zh: 丽贝卡·布莱克：♫今天是周五，周五。玩乐派对在周五。♫ ♫每个人都期待着过周末，周末。♫ ♫周五，周五。玩乐在周五。♫ 凯文：如果没有这部视频，你未必能想到 我们将有接下来这场谈论。

translation.en: Rebecca Black's "Friday" is one of the most popular videos of the year.
translation.zh: 丽贝卡·布莱克的“周五”是年度最红的视频之一。

translation.en: It's been seen nearly 200 million times this year.
translation.zh: 今年吸引了将近两亿的观看次数。

translation.en: This is a chart of what it looked like.
translation.zh: 这张图表展现了它流行的趋势。

translation.en: And similar to "Double Rainbow,"  it seems to have just sprouted up out of nowhere.
translation.zh: 跟熊先生的“两道彩虹”雷同， 这部视频好像不知从哪儿就猛然窜红。

translation.en: So what happened on this day?
translation.zh: 那天究竟发生什么事情呢？

translation.en: Well it was a Friday, this is true.
translation.zh: 噢，就是那天，一个周五，真的。

translation.en: And if you're wondering about those other spikes, those are also Fridays.
translation.zh: 如果你疑惑那些高峰时期，那些全是在周五。

translation.en: But what about this day,  this one particular Friday?
translation.zh: 但是在那天， 这个特别的周五究竟发生什么呢？

translation.en: Well Tosh.0 picked it up, a lot of blogs starting writing about.
translation.zh: 就是Tosh.0选中了它，很多部落格也争相讨论。

translation.en: Michael J. Nelson from Mystery Science Theater  was one of the first people to post a joke about the video on Twitter.
translation.zh: 奥秘科学剧院（电视节目)的迈克尔·约翰·纳尔逊 率先在他的推特上嘲弄这部视频。

translation.en: But what's important is that an individual or a group of tastemakers  took a point of view  and they shared that with a larger audience, accelerating the process.
translation.zh: 重点有这样一个或一群潮流先锋 看了视频后 跟广大观众分享他们的观点，加速整个视频窜红。

translation.en: And so then this community formed  of people who shared this big inside joke  and they started talking about it and doing things with it.
translation.zh: 而这个群体形成 共享笑话并不断分享， 不但会讨论它，还会恶搞出自己的版本。

translation.en: And now there are 10,000 parodies of "Friday" on YouTube.
translation.zh: 所以现在有上万个恶搞版"周五”在YouTube上传播。

translation.en: Even in the first seven days,  there was one parody for every other day of the week.
translation.zh: 就连周一至周末 都有不同的滑稽模仿。

translation.en: Unlike the one-way entertainment of the 20th century,  this community participation  is how we become a part of the phenomenon --  either by spreading it or by doing something new with it.
translation.zh: 不像二十世纪的单向娱乐媒体， 这是一个集体参与 从而让我们成为全民现象一部分-- 通过传播或者自主创新。

translation.en: So "Nyan Cat" is a looped animation  with looped music.
translation.zh: 这只“Nyan Cat" 是一种连环动画片 配合连续的背景音乐。

translation.en: It's this, just like this.
translation.zh: 就是这个，只是这样。

translation.en: It's been viewed nearly 50 million times this year.
translation.zh: 今年被观看次数多达五千万次。

translation.en: And if you think that that is weird,  you should know that there is a three-hour version of this  that's been viewed four million times.
translation.zh: 假如你觉得这个是不可思议， 你就更难想象这段视频还有三小时的版本 吸引了四百万人观看。

translation.en: Even cats were watching this video.
translation.zh: 甚至还有猫会看这部视频。

translation.en: Cats were watching other cats watch this video.
translation.zh: 猫在看其他猫观看这部视频。

translation.en: But what's important here  is the creativity that it inspired  amongst this techie, geeky Internet culture.
translation.zh: 但这最重要的 是激发了创意 的这种科技，极客网络文化。

translation.en: There were remixes.
translation.zh: 还制作了混音版。

translation.en: Someone made an old timey version.
translation.zh: 有人还制作了怀旧版。

translation.en: And then it went international.
translation.zh: 然后走国际版路线。

translation.en: An entire remix community sprouted up  that brought it from being just a stupid joke  to something that we can all actually be a part of.
translation.zh: 整个混音群窜红 让这个原本只是个愚弄笑话 变成大家都可以参与创作的玩意。

translation.en: Because we don't just enjoy now,  we participate.
translation.zh: 因为现在我们不仅在享乐， 我们还参与其中。

translation.en: And who could have predicted any of this?
translation.zh: 有谁能料到这一切呢？

translation.en: Who could have predicted "Double Rainbow" or Rebecca Black  or "Nyan Cat?"
translation.zh: 谁能料到“两道彩虹”或丽贝卡·布莱克 又或者“Nyan Cat” (喵喵喵）会红呢？

translation.en: What scripts could you have written  that would have contained this in it?
translation.zh: 你会写怎样的剧本 会在里面包含这些创作？

translation.en: In a world where over two days of video  get uploaded every minute,  only that which is truly unique and unexpected  can stand out in the way that these things have.
translation.zh: 在这个每分钟就上传足够两天 观看的网络视频世界， 只有那些独特和难以想象的视频 才能引人关注。

translation.en: When a friend of mine told me that I needed to see this great video  about a guy protesting bicycle fines in New York City,  I admit I wasn't very interested.
translation.zh: 我的一个朋友大力推荐一段很赞的视频 是一个抗议纽约市单车罚款的人拍的， 我得承认我原本没什么兴趣。

translation.en: Casey Niestat: So I got a ticket for not riding in the bike lane,  but often there are obstructions  that keep you from properly riding in the bike lane.
translation.zh: 凯西·尼塞特：我吃了一张罚单，因为我没在自行车道上骑车， 不过常常因为许多障碍 让你根本没法在自行车道上好好骑车。

translation.en: KA: By being totally surprising and humorous,  Casey Niestat got his funny idea and point  seen five million times.
translation.zh: 凯文：以出人意料的幽默方式 凯西·尼塞特有他有趣的想法和论点 吸引了五百万人次观看。

translation.en: And so this approach holds  for anything new that we do creatively.
translation.zh: 这种方式适用于 我们创新的每一件事上。

translation.en: And so it all brings us  to one big question ...
translation.zh: 所以促使我们 有这样一个问题...

translation.en: Bear Vasquez: What does this mean?
translation.zh: 熊先生 · 瓦斯奎兹：这代表什么？

translation.en: Ohhhh.
KA: What does it mean?
translation.zh: 凯文：这意味什么？

translation.en: Tastemakers, creative participating communities,  complete unexpectedness,  these are characteristics of a new kind of media and a new kind of culture  where anyone has access  and the audience defines the popularity.
translation.zh: 潮流先锋，创意参与团体， 以及怪咖， 这些是新媒体和新文化的特征 在其中人人能参与 让观众定义何为流行。

translation.en: I mean, as mentioned earlier,  one of the biggest stars in the world right now, Justin Bieber,  got his start on YouTube.
translation.zh: 正如我上述， 现在最红的艺人贾斯汀·比伯， 也是从YouTube上窜红。

translation.en: No one has to green-light your idea.
translation.zh: 你的点子不需要人允准。

translation.en: And we all now feel some ownership  in our own pop culture.
translation.zh: 在自创流行文化中 我们都有自主权。

translation.en: And these are not characteristics of old media,  and they're barely true of the media of today,  but they will define the entertainment of the future.
translation.zh: 然而这一切并不是旧媒体的特征， 也不能完全代表今天的媒体， 不过它们一定会成为未来媒体的娱乐形态。

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢。

translation.en: How can I speak in 10 minutes  about the bonds of women over three generations,  about how the astonishing strength of those bonds  took hold in the life  of a four-year-old girl  huddled with her young sister,  her mother and her grandmother  for five days and nights  in a small boat in the China Sea  more than 30 years ago,  bonds that took hold in the life of that small girl
translation.zh: 10分钟何尝够我来讲述， 关于三代妇女间的纽带， 关于这条纽带的惊人的力量 把 4岁小姑娘和 她的妹妹 母亲、祖母绑在一起， 5天5夜 挤在一条小船飘在中国海 已经过去了30多年， 一直留在小女孩的脑海中

translation.en: and never let go --  that small girl now living in San Francisco  and speaking to you today?
translation.zh: 不曾磨灭-- 那个小女孩现在居住在旧金山 今天正在为你们讲述

translation.en: This is not a finished story.
translation.zh: 一个不断延续的故事

translation.en: It is a jigsaw puzzle still being put together.
translation.zh: 就像一幅正在被拼接的拼图一样

translation.en: Let me tell you about some of the pieces.
translation.zh: 请允许我讲述其中的片段

translation.en: Imagine the first piece:  a man burning his life's work.
translation.zh: 回想起来的第一个画面是 一个男人拼尽全力地工作。

translation.en: He is a poet, a playwright,  a man whose whole life  had been balanced on the single hope  of his country's unity and freedom.
translation.zh: 他是一个诗人兼剧作家 一生 都致力于 国家的统一和自由。

translation.en: Imagine him as the communists enter Saigon,  confronting the fact  that his life had been a complete waste.
translation.zh: 想象着他作为一名共产主义者进入胡志明市 面对着 完全被抛弃的一生

translation.en: Words, for so long his friends, now mocked him.
translation.zh: 面对朋友们的嘲笑

translation.en: He retreated into silence.
translation.zh: 他沉默以对

translation.en: He died broken by history.
translation.zh: 作为历史，他已经死去

translation.en: He is my grandfather.
translation.zh: 他就是我的祖父

translation.en: I never knew him in real life.
translation.zh: 我从来不了解他的真实生活。

translation.en: But our lives are much more than our memories.
translation.zh: 但是我们的生活比记忆更加丰富。

translation.en: My grandmother never let me forget his life.
translation.zh: 祖父让我永记他的一生。

translation.en: My duty was not to allow it to have been in vain,  and my lesson was to learn  that, yes, history tried to crush us,  but we endured.
translation.zh: 而我的职责就是不让他的经历成为徒劳 我的责任是从中学习 是的，历史试图打垮我们 而我们一直忍受着。

translation.en: The next piece of the jigsaw  is of a boat in the early dawn  slipping silently out to sea.
translation.zh: 下一块拼图是 黎明的早上一叶扁舟 悄悄滑向大海

translation.en: My mother, Mai, was 18  when her father died --  already in an arranged marriage,  already with two small girls.
translation.zh: 我母亲，Mai，18岁 丧父 经历了一系列婚姻， 有了两个小女儿。

translation.en: For her, life had distilled itself into one task:  the escape of her family  and a new life in Australia.
translation.zh: 对于她，生活唯一目的就是 逃离家庭 在澳大利亚开始新生活。

translation.en: It was inconceivable to her  that she would not succeed.
translation.zh: 这对她来说， 简直就是天方夜谭。

translation.en: So after a four-year saga that defies fiction,  a boat slipped out to sea  disguised as a fishing vessel.
translation.zh: 因此，4年的蔑视小说的长篇故事 一条小船滑向大海， 远离渔船。

translation.en: All the adults knew the risks.
translation.zh: 大人们知道其中的危险。

translation.en: The greatest fear was of pirates,  rape and death.
translation.zh: 最大的威胁是海盗， 强奸和死亡。

translation.en: Like most adults on the boat,  my mother carried a small bottle of poison.
translation.zh: 和所有成年人一样， 我母亲带了一小瓶毒药。

translation.en: If we were captured, first my sister and I,  then she and my grandmother would drink.
translation.zh: 如果我们被抓获，我妹妹、我、 母亲和祖母依次服毒自尽。

translation.en: My first memories are from the boat --  the steady beat of the engine,  the bow dipping into each wave,  the vast and empty horizon.
translation.zh: 我的第一个记忆来自于小船-- 发动机均匀的节奏 浅浅的波浪 一望无尽的海平面

translation.en: I don't remember the pirates who came many times,  but were bluffed by the bravado  of the men on our boat,  or the engine dying  and failing to start for six hours.
translation.zh: 我不记得海盗来了几次， 却被船上男人们的虚张声势 吓跑了， 引擎熄火， 6个小时无法启动。

translation.en: But I do remember the lights on the oil rig  off the Malaysian coast  and the young man who collapsed and died,  the journey's end too much for him,  and the first apple I tasted,  given to me by the men on the rig.
translation.zh: 但是我记得边石油钻井反射的光； 来自马来西亚海岸 年轻小伙虚脱而死， 旅途早早结束； 我尝到的第一个苹果， 来自同船的一个男人。

translation.en: No apple has ever tasted the same.
translation.zh: 再也没有吃到那么美味的苹果。

translation.en: After three months in a refugee camp,  we landed in Melbourne.
translation.zh: 在难民集中营的三个月后， 我们定居在墨尔本。

translation.en: And the next piece of the jigsaw  is about four women across three generations  shaping a new life together.
translation.zh: 下一片拼图是 关于三代妇女 共同创造的新生活。

translation.en: We settled in Footscray,  a working-class suburb  whose demographic is layers of immigrants.
translation.zh: 定居于Footscray， 一个的工薪阶层市郊, 以移民为主.

translation.en: Unlike the settled middle-class suburbs,  whose existence I was oblivious of,  there was no sense of entitlement in Footscray.
translation.zh: 不像定居其他中级阶层市郊， 我忘记了我的存在， 更别说权利了。

translation.en: The smells from shop doors were from the rest of the world.
translation.zh: 商店透出的味道仿佛来自另一个世界。

translation.en: And the snippets of halting English  were exchanged between people  who had one thing in common,  they were starting again.
translation.zh: 说着同样磕磕绊绊的英语， 人们相互交流着。 有一件事情是相同的， 又重新开始了。

translation.en: My mother worked on farms,  then on a car assembly line,  working six days, double shifts.
translation.zh: 母亲一开始在农村干活， 后来去了汽车组装线， 一周工作6天，双班倒。

translation.en: Somehow she found time to study English  and gain IT qualifications.
translation.zh: 有时她挤时间学习英语， 获得了IT资格证。

translation.en: We were poor.
translation.zh: 我们很穷，

translation.en: All the dollars were allocated  and extra tuition in English and mathematics  was budgeted for  regardless of what missed out,  which was usually new clothes;  they were always secondhand.
translation.zh: 节约每一分钱。 剩余的钱都用来缴英语和数学的学费， 不管再难， 即使没有 新衣服穿， 穿二手的。

translation.en: Two pairs of stockings for school,  each to hide the holes in the other.
translation.zh: 上学时穿两双袜子， 一双遮挡另一双上的洞。

translation.en: A school uniform down to the ankles,  because it had to last for six years.
translation.zh: 学校的制服盖过了膝盖， 因为它得坚持6年。

translation.en: And there were rare but searing chants  of "slit-eye"  and the occasional graffiti:  "Asian, go home."
translation.zh: 虽然很少，但是搜寻圣歌的 边边角角， 偶尔的涂鸦说 “亚洲人，回家去吧！”

translation.en: Go home to where?
translation.zh: 回家回到哪儿？

translation.en: Something stiffened inside me.
translation.zh: 一些事情刺痛了我的内心。

translation.en: There was a gathering of resolve  and a quiet voice saying, "I will bypass you."
translation.zh: 一股力量在凝聚， 安静的声音在说：“我要超越你。”

translation.en: My mother, my sister and I  slept in the same bed.
translation.zh: 我、我妹妹和我母亲 睡在同一张床上。

translation.en: My mother was exhausted each night,  but we told one another about our day  and listened to the movements  of my grandmother around the house.
translation.zh: 每晚母亲都拖着疲惫的身体回家， 但是我们互相交流一天的事情， 听着旁白房间 祖母的动静。

translation.en: My mother suffered from nightmares  all about the boat.
translation.zh: 我母亲一直梦魇困扰着， 都是关于小船的。

translation.en: And my job was to stay awake until her nightmares came  so I could wake her.
translation.zh: 我的工作就是保持清醒，在她做恶梦的时候 叫醒她。

translation.en: She opened a computer store  then studied to be a beautician  and opened another business.
translation.zh: 她开了一家计算机商店， 学习美容， 将来开一家美容店。

translation.en: And the women came with their stories  about men who could not make the transition,  angry and inflexible,  and troubled children caught between two worlds.
translation.zh: 关于男人的故事， 没有过渡， 生气，呆板， 问题小孩，就像两个世界。

translation.en: Grants and sponsors were sought.
translation.zh: 寻求资金和资助人，

translation.en: Centers were established.
translation.zh: 建立了中心。

translation.en: I lived in parallel worlds.
translation.zh: 我生活在一个平行的世界。

translation.en: In one, I was the classic Asian student,  relentless in the demands that I made on myself.
translation.zh: 一方面，我是典型的亚洲学生， 自己特别狠；

translation.en: In the other, I was enmeshed in lives that were precarious,  tragically scarred by violence,  drug abuse and isolation.
translation.zh: 另一方面，我纠缠于现实的危险， 暴力冲突的可悲， 毒品泛滥和种族隔离。

translation.en: But so many over the years were helped.
translation.zh: 但是如此多年的帮助，

translation.en: And for that work, when I was a final year law student,  I was chosen as the young Australian of the year.
translation.zh: 当我曾为法律系毕业生的时候， 我被选择作为当年的澳大利亚年轻代表。

translation.en: And I was catapulted  from one piece of the jigsaw to another,  and their edges didn't fit.
translation.zh: 我直接 从一个片段跳到了另一个， 没有漂亮的连接。

translation.en: Tan Le, anonymous Footscray resident,  was now Tan Le, refugee and social activist,  invited to speak in venues she had never heard of  and into homes whose existence  she could never have imagined.
translation.zh: Tan Le一名Footscray普通居民， 现在是难民，社会积极分子， 被邀请演讲， 去一个从未听说过的 去一个无法想象是否存在的地方。

translation.en: I didn't know the protocols.
translation.zh: 我不知道协议，

translation.en: I didn't know how to use the cutlery.
translation.zh: 不知道如何用刀具，

translation.en: I didn't know how to talk about wine.
translation.zh: 不会谈论葡萄酒，

translation.en: I didn't know how to talk about anything.
translation.zh: 不会讲话。

translation.en: I wanted to retreat to the routines and comfort  of life in an unsung suburb --  a grandmother, a mother and two daughters  ending each day as they had for almost 20 years,  telling one another the story of their day  and falling asleep,  the three of us still in the same bed.
translation.zh: 我想要退回到原来， 无名市郊的舒适生活-- 祖母、目前和两个女儿 过着20多年的平淡生活， 相互谈论着过去的日子， 渐渐入睡， 我们三个还在一个床上。

translation.en: I told my mother I couldn't do it.
translation.zh: 我告诉我母亲，我做不到。

translation.en: She reminded me that I was now the same age she had been  when we boarded the boat.
translation.zh: 她提醒我，她带我们乘船出国的时候， 正好是我现在的年龄。

translation.en: No had never been an option.
translation.zh: 没有任何选择。

translation.en: "Just do it," she said,  "and don't be what you're not."
translation.zh: “放手去做”，她说 “做真正的自己”

translation.en: So I spoke out on youth unemployment and education  and the neglect of the marginalized and the disenfranchised.
translation.zh: 因此我讲到了失业低龄化和教育问题 忽视边缘群体和剥夺政治权利。

translation.en: And the more candidly I spoke,  the more I was asked to speak.
translation.zh: 我说的越坦率， 越是有人邀请我演讲。

translation.en: I met people from all walks of life,  so many of them doing the thing they loved,  living on the frontiers of possibility.
translation.zh: 遇见周围的人们， 做着自己喜欢的事情， 生活的

translation.en: And even though I finished my degree,  I realized I could not settle into a career in law.
translation.zh: 即使我完成了我的学业， 我意识到我不能局限于法律职业。

translation.en: There had to be another piece of the jigsaw.
translation.zh: 这儿还有另一个拼图的片段。

translation.en: And I realized at the same time  that it is okay to be an outsider,  a recent arrival,  new on the scene --  and not just okay,  but something to be thankful for,  perhaps a gift from the boat.
translation.zh: 同一时间，我意识到 作为局外人也可以， 最近的事情， 屏幕上的新闻 不仅仅是可以， 一些事情归功于 来自小船的经历。

translation.en: Because being an insider  can so easily mean collapsing the horizons,  can so easily mean  accepting the presumptions of your province.
translation.zh: 因为作为一个局内人， 太容易放弃视野， 太容易 接收你的假设。

translation.en: I have stepped outside my comfort zone enough now  to know that, yes, the world does fall apart,  but not in the way that you fear.
translation.zh: 我现在得站在舒适区足够远 是的，世界开始破碎， 不是按照你担心的那样。

translation.en: Possibilities that would not have been allowed  were outrageously encouraged.
translation.zh: 不允许贸然或者 鼓励放大可能性。

translation.en: There was an energy there,  an implacable optimism,  a strange mixture of humility and daring.
translation.zh: 这里有能量， 无情的乐观， 混合着人道和胆量。

translation.en: So I followed my hunches.
translation.zh: 跟随我的预感。

translation.en: I gathered around me a small team of people  for whom the label "It can't be done"  was an irresistible challenge.
translation.zh: 我聚集了一个小组 “不能完成”的标签 是我们唯一的挑战。

translation.en: For a year we were penniless.
translation.zh: 整整一年，我们一名不文。

translation.en: At the end of each day, I made a huge pot of soup  which we all shared.
translation.zh: 每一天最后，我都做一大锅汤 大家共享。

translation.en: We worked well into each night.
translation.zh: 每晚都努力工作。

translation.en: Most of our ideas were crazy,  but a few were brilliant,  and we broke through.
translation.zh: 我们大多数的想法都很疯狂， 还有少数很明智， 我们突破着。

translation.en: I made the decision to move to the U.S.
translation.zh: 我觉得搬到美国，

translation.en: after only one trip.
translation.zh: 在一次旅行后。

translation.en: My hunches again.
translation.zh: 我的直觉又一次成功了。

translation.en: Three months later I had relocated,  and the adventure has continued.
translation.zh: 我到达3个月后， 继续冒险。

translation.en: Before I close though,  let me tell you about my grandmother.
translation.zh: 在最后让我说说 我的祖母。

translation.en: She grew up at a time  when Confucianism was the social norm  and the local Mandarin was the person who mattered.
translation.zh: 她成长的时代 儒教盛行， 本地Mandarin最大。

translation.en: Life hadn't changed for centuries.
translation.zh: 几个世纪的生活都不曾改变。

translation.en: Her father died soon after she was born.
translation.zh: 她出生的时候，父亲去世，

translation.en: Her mother raised her alone.
translation.zh: 由母亲独自养大。

translation.en: At 17 she became the second wife  of a Mandarin whose mother beat her.
translation.zh: 她17岁嫁给了一个Mandarin， 做二房，遭到婆婆的打骂。

translation.en: With no support from her husband,  she caused a sensation by taking him to court  and prosecuting her own case,  and a far greater sensation when she won.
translation.zh: 没有丈夫的支持， 带着丈夫去法院起诉自己， 从而轰动一时， 胜诉的她更是名声远扬。

translation.en: "It can't be done" was shown to be wrong.
translation.zh: （鼓掌） “不可能”变成了可能。

translation.en: I was taking a shower in a hotel room in Sydney  I looked through the shower screen  and saw her standing on the other side.
translation.zh: 当她在600英里外的墨尔本 逝世时， 我正在悉尼的宾馆房间洗澡。 透过玻璃， 我看到她站在对面。

translation.en: I knew she had come to say goodbye.
translation.zh: 我知道她是来说声再见。

translation.en: My mother phoned minutes later.
translation.zh: 我母亲的电话几分钟后来了。

translation.en: A few days later,  we went to a Buddhist temple in Footscray  and sat around her casket.
translation.zh: 几天后， 我们去Footscray的佛寺， 坐在她的棺材旁。

translation.en: We told her stories  and assured her that we were still with her.
translation.zh: 我们讲述着故事， 向她保证我们一直陪着她。

translation.en: At midnight the monk came  and told us he had to close the casket.
translation.zh: 午夜僧人告诉我们， 他必须盖上棺材。

translation.en: My mother asked us to feel her hand.
translation.zh: 我母亲让我们感受祖母的手。

translation.en: She asked the monk,  "Why is it that her hand is so warm  and the rest of her is so cold?"
translation.zh: 她问僧人 “为什么祖母的手是温的， 其他地方那么凉？”

translation.en: "Because you have been holding it since this morning," he said.
translation.zh: “因为您从早上一直握到现在”，他说

translation.en: "You have not let it go."
translation.zh: “你从未放手”。

translation.en: If there is a sinew in our family,  it runs through the women.
translation.zh: 如果说我们家族有动力， 那它一定来着于妇女们。

translation.en: Given who we were and how life had shaped us,  we can now see  that the men who might have come into our lives  would have thwarted us.
translation.zh: 考虑到我们自身和生活的塑造， 我们现在可以预见， 一个男人必须挫败我们才能融入我们。 必须挫败我们才行。

translation.en: Defeat would have come too easily.
translation.zh: 失败来的太容易。

translation.en: Now I would like to have my own children,  and I wonder about the boat.
translation.zh: 现在我想要自己孩子， 自己的小船。

translation.en: Who could ever wish it on their own?
translation.zh: 又有谁不愿意呢？

translation.en: Yet I am afraid of privilege,  of ease,  of entitlement.
translation.zh: 然而我害怕特权、 安乐 和权利。

translation.en: Can I give them a bow in their lives,  dipping bravely into each wave,  the unperturbed and steady beat of the engine,  the vast horizon  that guarantees nothing?
translation.zh: 给他们生命的桨， 勇敢地划入每个波浪， 自然地、稳稳地发动机， 宽广的视野， 不用任何担保，我能做到吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道。

translation.en: But if I could give it  and still see them safely through,  I would.
translation.zh: 但是我可以放任它， 看着他们安全的通过， 这也是我希望的。

translation.en: Trevor Neilson: And also, Tan's mother is here today  in the fourth or fifth row.
translation.zh: 同时，Tan的目前今天也来到的现场， 就坐于第四、五排。

translation.en: My story begins right here actually in Rajasthan  about two years ago.
translation.zh: 我的故事就发生在拉贾斯坦邦 是在大约两年前

translation.en: I was in the desert, under the starry skies  with the Sufi singer Mukhtiar Ali.
translation.zh: 我在沙漠，在一个满是星光的天空下 和一名苏菲派的歌手木泰哈·阿里

translation.en: And we were in conversation  about how nothing had changed  since the time of the ancient Indian epic "The Mahabharata."
translation.zh: 我们的谈话是关于 没有任何事情被改变 自从古代印度史诗《摩呵婆罗多》的时候起

translation.en: So back in the day, when us Indians wanted to travel  we'd jump into a chariot and we'd zoom across the sky.
translation.zh: 回到过去，当我们想去旅游 我们跳进了一个战车飞驰过了天空

translation.en: Now we do the same with airplanes.
translation.zh: 现在我们用飞机可以同样做到

translation.en: Back then,  when Arjuna, the great Indian warrior prince,  when he was thirsty, he'd take out a bow,  he'd shoot it into the ground and water would come out.
translation.zh: 在那个时候， 当印度伟大的战王阿朱那， 当他渴了，他拔出一支箭， 射进地里水就会出来

translation.en: Now we do the same  with drills and machines.
translation.zh: 现在我们同样地 用钻头和机器

translation.en: The conclusion that we came to  was that magic had been replaced  by machinery.
translation.zh: 我们得到的结论就是 魔法被 机器代替了

translation.en: And this made me really sad.
translation.zh: 这令我感到伤心

translation.en: I found myself becoming a little bit of a technophobe.
translation.zh: 我发掘自己有点像个技术恐惧者

translation.en: I was terrified by this idea  that I would lose the ability  to enjoy and appreciate the sunset  without having my camera on me, without tweeting it to my friends.
translation.zh: 我对这种想法感到恐惧 我将会失去 享受和欣赏日落的能力 在没有相机，没有和我的朋友们微博的情况下

translation.en: And it felt like technology  should enable magic, not kill it.
translation.zh: 而且我觉得科技 应该实现魔法，而不是扼杀它

translation.en: When I was a little girl,  my grandfather gave me his little silver pocket watch.
translation.zh: 当我还是一个小女孩， 我的爷爷给我他的小银怀表

translation.en: And this piece of 50-year-old technology  became the most magical thing to me.
translation.zh: 这个50年久的科技玩意 成了对我最有魔力的东西

translation.en: It became a gilded gateway  into a world full of pirates and shipwrecks  and images in my imagination.
translation.zh: 在我的想象力中，它变成了一个镀金的大门 带我通向一个充满了海盗和失事船只 和富有想象的世界

translation.en: So I felt like our cellphones  and our fancy watches and our cameras  had stopped us from dreaming.
translation.zh: 所以我觉得我们的手机 我们华丽的手表和我们的相机 让我们停止了梦想

translation.en: They stopped us from being inspired.
translation.zh: 它们让我们失去了灵感

translation.en: And so I jumped in, I jumped into this world of technology,  to see how I could use it to enable magic  as opposed to kill it.
translation.zh: 所以我投入进了这个科技的世界， 看看如何能用它们来创造魔法 而不是扼杀它们

translation.en: I've been illustrating books since I was 16.
translation.zh: 我从16岁起就开始为书来作插图

translation.en: And so when I saw the iPad,  I saw it as a storytelling device  that could connect readers all over the world.
translation.zh: 当我看到iPad, 我把它当作一个讲故事的设备 可以将全世界的读者都联系起来

translation.en: It can know how we're holding it.
translation.zh: 它可以知道我们是如何拿着它

translation.en: It can know where we are.
translation.zh: 知道我们在哪里

translation.en: It brings together image and text  and animation and sound and touch.
translation.zh: 它将图像和文字 动画，声音和触感都结合起来

translation.en: Storytelling is becoming  more and more multi-sensorial.
translation.zh: 讲故事变成了 越来越多的多感官

translation.en: But what are we doing with it?
translation.zh: 但是我们能用它做什么呢？

translation.en: So I'm actually just going to go in and launch Khoya,  an interactive app for the iPad.
translation.zh: 所以我实际上要推出Khoya, 一个iPad互动程序

translation.en: So it says, "Place your fingers  upon each light."
translation.zh: 它说，“将您的手指 放在每一个灯上”

translation.en: And so --    It says, "This box belongs to ... "  And so I type in my name.
translation.zh: 然后--  它说，“这个盒子属于...” 所以我把我的名字输入进去

translation.en: And actually I become a character in the book.
translation.zh: 那我就成了这本书里的一个人物

translation.en: At various points, a little letter drops down to me --  and the iPad knows where you live because of GPS --  which is actually addressed to me.
translation.zh: 在不同的页面，一小封信掉下来给我-- 因为GPS, iPad知道你住在哪里 标记给我的

translation.en: The child in me is really excited  by these kinds of possibilities.
translation.zh: 我的孩子那一面十分兴奋 因为这些各种各样的可能性

translation.en: Now I've been talking a lot about magic.
translation.zh: 现在我一直在谈论魔法

translation.en: And I don't mean wizards and dragons,  I mean the kind of childhood magic,  those ideas that we all harbored as children.
translation.zh: 并不是指巫婆和神龙， 而是指孩子们的魔法， 那些我们孩童时候心存的想法

translation.en: This idea of fireflies in a jar, for some reason,  was always really exciting to me.
translation.zh: 不知道为什么，萤火虫在坛子里的想法 常常令我十分兴奋

translation.en: And so over here you need to tilt your iPad,  take the fireflies out.
translation.zh: 在这里你需要倾斜你的iPad, 让这些萤火虫出来

translation.en: And they actually illuminate your way through the rest of the book.
translation.zh: 它们就可以照亮你的整本书

translation.en: Another idea that really fascinated me as a child  was that an entire galaxy could be contained  within a single marble.
translation.zh: 另一个令人着迷的主意就是当我还是个孩子 整个银河系将被 一块大理石包裹着

translation.en: And so over here,  each book and each world  becomes a little marble  that I drag in  to this magical device within the device.
translation.zh: 所以在这里 每一本书都 变成一个小的大理石 我将它们用这个装置 托进这个魔法的装置里面

translation.en: And it opens up a map.
translation.zh: 然后它打开一张地图

translation.en: All along, all fantasy books have always had maps,  but these maps have been static.
translation.zh: 随之，所有神奇的书都有地图， 但是这些地图一直是静止的

translation.en: This is a map that grows and glows  and becomes your navigation for the rest of the book.
translation.zh: 这是一张地图变化并且发热 成为你剩下这本书的导航

translation.en: It reveals itself to you at certain points in the book as well.
translation.zh: 在这本书的某处它也会显示出自己

translation.en: So I'm just going to enter in.
translation.zh: 所以我正准备进入

translation.en: Another thing that's actually really important to me  is creating content that is Indian  and yet very contemporary.
translation.zh: 另一个对我而言真的重要的事情就是 创造非常印度 却又非常现代的内容

translation.en: Over here, these are the Apsaras.
translation.zh: 在这里，这些是飞天

translation.en: So we've all heard about fairies and we've all heard about nymphs,  but how many people outside of India  know about their Indian counterparts, the Apsaras?
translation.zh: 我们都听说过仙女，听说过女神， 但是有多少在印度之外的人 知道关于她们的对应者，飞天？

translation.en: These poor Apsaras have been trapped inside Indra's chambers for thousands of years  in an old and musty book.
translation.zh: 这些可怜的飞天被困在因陀罗的小屋子里数千年 在一个古老的发霉的书中

translation.en: And so we're bringing them back  in a contemporary story for children.
translation.zh: 因此我们将她们带回来 带到和孩子们同时代的故事里

translation.en: And a story that actually deals with new issues  like the environmental crisis.
translation.zh: 一个解决新问题的故事， 如同环境危机

translation.en: Speaking of the environmental crisis,  I think a big problem has been in the last 10 years  is that children have been locked inside their rooms,  glued to their PCs, they haven't been able to get out.
translation.zh: (音乐） 谈起环境危机， 我觉得最近10年的一个最大的问题 就是孩子们被关在他们的房间里， 紧紧帖在他们的电脑上，他们不能出去

translation.en: But now with mobile technology,  we can actually take our children outside into the natural world  One of the interactions in the book  is that you're sent off on this quest  where you need to go outside,  take out your camera on the iPad  and collect pictures of different natural objects.
translation.zh: 但是现在用移动式的科技， 我们可以用科技 把我们的孩子领出去带到自然世界 在这本书中的一个互动就是 这个要求命令 你需要去到外面世界， 用你iPad上的相机 收集不同的自然物的照片

translation.en: When I was a child, I had multiple collections  of sticks and stones and pebbles and shells.
translation.zh: 当我还是一个孩子，我有各种不同的收集 如木条，石头，鹅卵石和贝壳

translation.en: And somehow kids don't do that anymore.
translation.zh: 不知道为什么孩子们不再收集了

translation.en: So in bringing back this childhood ritual,  you need to go out  and, in one chapter, take a picture of a flower  and then tag it.
translation.zh: 所以我把这个孩子时候的仪式带了回来， 你需要走出去 在一个章节里，照一张花儿的照片 然后给它标记命名

translation.en: In another chapter, you need to take a picture of a piece of bark  and then tag that.
translation.zh: 在另一个章节里，你需要照一张树皮的照片 然后标记它

translation.en: And what happens  is that you actually create a digital collection of photographs  that you can then put up online.
translation.zh: 接下来发生的就是 你实际上创造了一个数码的相片的收集 你可以把它放到网上

translation.en: A child in London puts up a picture of a fox  and says, "Oh, I saw a fox today."
translation.zh: 一个在伦敦的孩子放上去了一张狐狸的照片 说，“哦，我今天看到了一只狐狸”

translation.en: A child in India says, "I saw a monkey today."
translation.zh: 一个在印度的孩子说，“我今天看到了一只猴子”

translation.en: And it creates this kind of social network  around a collection of digital photographs  that you've actually taken.
translation.zh: 它创造出这样的一个社交网络， 围绕着这样一个 实际上是你照的数码相片的收集

translation.en: In the possibilities of linking together  magic, the earth and technology,  there are multiple possibilities.
translation.zh: 有了这些魔法 地球和科技都联系起来的可能性 这里就会有更多种多样的可能性

translation.en: In the next book, we plan on having an interaction  where you take your iPad out with the video on  and through augmented reality,  you see this layer of animated pixies  appear on a houseplant that's outside your house.
translation.zh: 在下本书中，我们计划一种互动 你用iPad的视频 通过增强现实， 你看这层是活泼乱动的精灵 出现在你房子外面的盆栽上

translation.en: At one point, your screen is filled up with leaves.
translation.zh: 在某一点上，你的屏幕上布满了树叶

translation.en: And so you need to make the sound of wind and blow them away  and read the rest of the book.
translation.zh: 所以你需要弄出风的声音将它们吹走 然后读书下面的部分

translation.en: We're moving, we're all moving here,  to a world where the forces of nature  come closer together to technology,  and magic and technology can come closer together.
translation.zh: 我们在移动，移动到这里 到一个自然的力量和科技变得越来越近 的一个世界， 魔法和科技可以走得更近

translation.en: We're harnessing energy from the sun.
translation.zh: 我们利用太阳的能量

translation.en: We're bringing our children and ourselves  closer to the natural world  and childhood love that we had  through the simple medium of a story.
translation.zh: 我们把我们的孩子和我们自己 和自然世界拉得更近 和我们 通过一个简单的传媒故事 带来魔法和愉快，以及孩童时候的爱

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I would like to talk to you  about why many e-health projects fail.
translation.zh: 我想和大家谈谈 众多电子医疗保健项目失败的原因

translation.en: And I really think that the most important thing of it  is that we stopped listening to patients.
translation.zh: 我想最重要的一点 是我们没有倾听病人的心声

translation.en: And one of the things we did at Radboud University  is we appointed a chief listening officer.
translation.zh: 我们在荷兰内梅亨大学做的一件事 就是委任了一名首席倾听官

translation.en: Not in a very scientific way --  she puts up a little cup of coffee or cup of tea  and asks patients, family, relatives,  "What's up?
translation.zh: 不是以一种很科学的方式－ 她倒杯咖啡或者茶 问问病人，家庭，亲戚 “近来好啊？

translation.en: How could we help you?"
translation.zh: 有什么需要我们帮助的？”

translation.en: And we think, we like to think,  that this is one of the major problems  but most of the e-health projects fail,  since we stopped listening.
translation.zh: 我想，我们愿意认为 这就是导致 几乎所有电子医疗保健项目失败的 主要原因之一 即我们没有倾听

translation.en: This is my WiFi scale. It's a very simple thing.
translation.zh: 这是我的WiFi体重测量仪 是个很简单的玩意

translation.en: It's got one knob, on/off.
translation.zh: 这有个开关

translation.en: And every morning I hop on it.
translation.zh: 每天早上我坐上去称重

translation.en: And yes, I've got a challenge,  as you might see.
translation.zh: 哈不错，我给自己定了个目标值 你可以看到的

translation.en: And I put my challenge on 95 kg.
translation.zh: 我把体重目标值定为95kg

translation.en: But the thing is that it's made this simple  that whenever I hop on,  it sends my data through Google Health as well.
translation.zh: 事实上整个操作非常简单 我一坐上去 它就把我的数据发送到谷歌健康

translation.en: And it's collected by my general practitioner as well,  so he can see what's my problem in weight,  not on the very moment  that I need cardiologic support or something like it,  but also looking backward.
translation.zh: 同时我的全科医生也可以收到 然后他就能看看我的体重有什么问题 不是等到像心脏病发作 这样十万火急的时候才想到看体重 而是一路走来都会关注

translation.en: But there's another thing.
translation.zh: 但还有一点

translation.en: As some of you might know, I've got more than 4,000 followers on Twitter.
translation.zh: 你们有些人可能知道 我在推特上有四千多粉丝

translation.en: So every morning  I hop on my WiFi scale  and before I'm in my car, people start talking to me,  "I think you need a light lunch today, Lucien."
translation.zh: 所以每天早上 我用WiFi体重测量仪称重 在我上车之前 人们就开始跟我说话了 “我想你今天午饭还是就简吧，吕西安”

translation.en: But that's the nicest thing that could happen,  since this is peer pressure,  peer pressure used to help patients --  since this could be used for obesity,  it could be used  to stop smoking in patients.
translation.zh: 但其实那再好不过了 因为这是同伴压力 同伴压力能帮助病人－ 它可以帮助治疗肥胖 可以帮助 戒烟

translation.en: But on the other hand, it also could be used  to get people from out of their chairs  and try to work together in some kind of gaming activity  to get more control of their health.
translation.zh: 但是另外一方面，它也可以 把人们聚集到一起 参加一些类似游戏的活动 来更好地维护健康

translation.en: As of next week, it will soon be available.
translation.zh: 下一周这个功能就要上马了

translation.en: There will be this little blood pressure meter  connected to an iPhone or something or other.
translation.zh: 届时会有一个像这样的小血压计 连接到智能手机或者其他设备上

translation.en: And people will be able, from their homes,  to take their blood pressure,  send it into their doctor  and eventually share it with others, for instance,  for over a hundred dollars.
translation.zh: 然后人们便可在家中 测量血压 之后把数据发给他们的医生 同时也可同其他人分享 只要一百美元

translation.en: And this is the point where patients get into position  and can collect, not only their own control again,  be captain of their own ship,  but also can help us in health care  due to the challenges that we face,  like health care cost explosion,  doubled demand and things like that.
translation.zh: 这就是关键之处，当患者各就各位 收集数据时，他们不仅能自我控制 亲自掌舵 还能帮助我们应付 医疗保健中面临的挑战 比如医疗费用剧增 或者需求成倍增加等等

translation.en: Make techniques that are easy to use  and start with this to embrace patients in the team.
translation.zh: 我们要让技术便于掌控 以鼓励已步入轨道的病人

translation.en: And you can do this with techniques like this,  but also by crowd-sourcing.
translation.zh: 你可以通过这样的技术来实现 也可以将任务分派给普通大众

translation.en: And one of the things we did  I would like to share with you introduced by a little video.
translation.zh: 今天我将通过 一个短片来向各位展示我们做的一个项目

translation.en: We've all got navigation controls in our car.
translation.zh: 我们车里都有导航装置

translation.en: We maybe even [have] it in our cellphone.
translation.zh: 甚至手机里也有

translation.en: We know perfectly where all the ATMs are  about the city of Maastricht.
translation.zh: 我们知道马斯特里赫特市 所有ATM的位置

translation.en: The other thing is we know where all the gas stations are.
translation.zh: 也知道所有加油站的位置

translation.en: And sure, we could find fast food chains.
translation.zh: 当然还有快餐店

translation.en: But where would be the nearest AED  to help this patient?
translation.zh: 但是最近的能拯救患者的 自动体外除颤器在哪儿？

translation.en: We asked around and nobody knew.
translation.zh: 我们到处问也没有人知道

translation.en: Nobody knew where the nearest life-saving AED  was to be obtained right now.
translation.zh: 没人知道的能救命的自动体外除颤器 现在能找到了

translation.en: So what we did, we crowdsourced The Netherlands.
translation.zh: 我们将属于整个荷兰的任务派发给群众

translation.en: We set up a website  and asked the crowd, "If you see an AED,  please submit it, tell us where it is,  tell us when it's open,"  since sometimes in office hours sometimes it's closed, of course.
translation.zh: 我们建了一个网站 告诉人们，“如果你看到一个自动体外除颤器 就请在网上标出它的位置 并备注开放时间” 备注是因为它不一定24小时都开放

translation.en: And over 10,000 AEDs already in The Netherlands  already have been submitted.
translation.zh: 在荷兰已经有一万多个AED 被标注上了

translation.en: The next step we took was to find the applications for it.
translation.zh: 下一步就是开发相应的应用程序

translation.en: And we built an iPad application.
translation.zh: 我们开发了一个iPad应用

translation.en: We made an application for Layar, augmented reality,  to find these AEDs.
translation.zh: 一个Layar的应用，扩增实境 来寻找AED

translation.en: And whenever you are in a city like Maastricht and somebody collapses,  you can use your iPhone,  and within the next weeks also run your Microsoft cellphone,  to find the nearest AED  which can save lives.
translation.zh: 如果你在马斯特里赫特市 看到有人倒下了 你可以用iPhone 几周之内微软手机也可以了 找到最近的AED 来拯救生命

translation.en: And as of today,  we would like to introduce this, not only as AED4EU,  which is what the product is called,  but also AED4US.
translation.zh: 今天 我想介绍的，不仅仅是AED4U 这是那个产品的名字 还有aed4.us

translation.en: And we would like to start this on a worldwide level.
translation.zh: 我们打算将这项目推广到全世界

translation.en: And [we're] asking all of our colleagues in the rest of the world,  colleague universities, to help us  to find and work and act like a hub  to crowd-source all these AEDs all around the world.
translation.zh: 在这里我们也呼吁世界各地的同事 和大学来帮我们 让我们万众一心 一起将世界各地的AED标识出来

translation.en: That whenever you're on holiday and somebody collapses,  might it be your own relative or someone just in front of you,  you can find this.
translation.zh: 这样当你假日外出看见有人昏倒了 也许是你的亲人或者只是路人 你就能找到AED

translation.en: The other thing we would like to ask  is of companies also all over the world  that will be able to help us validate these AEDs.
translation.zh: 在这里我们还想呼吁 世界上的各个公司 能帮我们验证这些AED

translation.en: These might be courier services  or cable guys for instance,  just to see whether the AED that's submitted  still is in place.
translation.zh: 譬如，或许让快递员 或者电报员 去看看被标识的AED 是不是还在那个位置

translation.en: So please help us on this one  and try to make not only health a little bit better, but take control of it.
translation.zh: 所以请在这一项目上帮助我们 让我们不仅更健康，并且能将其掌握，胸有成竹

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家

translation.en: I'm here to share my photography.
translation.zh: 今天我想在此跟大家分享一下我的摄影作品

translation.en: Or is it photography?
translation.zh: 或者说，这张也是摄影作品么？

translation.en: Because, of course, this is a photograph  that you can't take with your camera.
translation.zh: 因为，这显然是一张照片 但却是你用相机拍不出来的

translation.en: Yet, my interest in photography started  as I got my first digital camera  at the age of 15.
translation.zh: 然而，我对摄影的兴趣 始于我拿到第一个数码相机后 那时候我15岁

translation.en: It mixed with my earlier passion for drawing,  but it was a bit different,  because using the camera,  the process was in the planning instead.
translation.zh: 这里面夹杂了我之前对绘画的热爱 但是有一点不一样 因为使用照相机的时候 整个过程已经提前计划好了

translation.en: And when you take a photograph with a camera,  the process ends when you press the trigger.
translation.zh: 当你拿起相机拍照 当你摁下快门的时候整个过程也就结束了

translation.en: So to me it felt like photography was more about  being at the right place and the right time.
translation.zh: 所以在我看来摄影更注重 适当的拍摄地点和时间

translation.en: I felt like anyone could do that.
translation.zh: 我觉得任何人都可以做这件事

translation.en: So I wanted to create something different,  something where the process starts  when you press the trigger.
translation.zh: 所以我想做点特别的 特别之处就在于当你摁下快门时 整个过程才刚刚开始

translation.en: Photos like this:  construction going on along a busy road.
translation.zh: 比如这张照片： 一条繁忙的公路旁边正在进行施工

translation.en: But it has an unexpected twist.
translation.zh: （题材平凡，）但手法出人意料

translation.en: And despite that,  it retains a level of realism.
translation.zh: 尽管如此 它仍然保留了一份现实主义感

translation.en: Or photos like these --  both dark and colorful,  but all with a common goal  of retaining the level of realism.
translation.zh: 或者像这样的照片 既有暗色也有彩色 但是其目的都是 为了保留一份现实主义感

translation.en: When I say realism,  I mean photo-realism.
translation.zh: 我说的现实主义 指的是照片的现实主义

translation.en: Because, of course,  it's not something you can capture really,  but I always want it to look like it could have been captured somehow  as a photograph.
translation.zh: 因为这的确 不是你可以真正抓住的东西 但是我总想让它看起来像是可以用某种方式 被抓拍下来一样

translation.en: Photos where you will need a brief moment to think  to figure out the trick.
translation.zh: 这些照片需要你能够快速 找出它们背后的技巧

translation.en: So it's more about capturing an idea  than about capturing a moment really.
translation.zh: 所以更注重的是捕捉一个灵感 而不是捕捉一个真实存在的瞬间

translation.en: But what's the trick  that makes it look realistic?
translation.zh: 但是使这些照片看起来 很写实的技巧是什么呢？

translation.en: Is it something about the details  or the colors?
translation.zh: 是关于细节？ 还是关于色彩？

translation.en: Is it something about the light?
translation.zh: 还是关于光线？

translation.en: What creates the illusion?
translation.zh: 是什么促成了这种幻觉？

translation.en: Sometimes the perspective is the illusion.
translation.zh: 有时候不同的视角造成不同的幻觉

translation.en: But in the end, it comes down to how we interpret the world  and how it can be realized on a two-dimensional surface.
translation.zh: 但最终，还是要归结于我们如何理解这个世界 以及这种理解如何在一个二维空间得以体现

translation.en: It's not really what is realistic,  it's what we think looks realistic really.
translation.zh: 这并不是关于什么是真的 而是关于我们认为什么看起来像是真的

translation.en: So I think the basics  are quite simple.
translation.zh: 所以我认为这些基本原理 其实很简单

translation.en: I just see it as a puzzle of reality  where you can take different pieces of reality and put it together  to create alternate reality.
translation.zh: 我把它看做是现实世界的一个拼图 在这里你可以把现实世界的不同片段拼凑起来 创造另一种真实

translation.en: And let me show you a simple example.
translation.zh: 让我来举个简单的例子

translation.en: Here we have three perfectly imaginable physical objects,  something we all can relate to living in a three-dimensional world.
translation.zh: 这里有三个完全可想象到并真实存在的物体 我们可以在现实的三维世界里找到它们

translation.en: But combined in a certain way,  they can create something that still looks three-dimensional,  like it could exist.
translation.zh: 但若将这些物体用某种方式组合起来 就可以创造出视觉上依然是三维的物体 就好像它是会存在的

translation.en: But at the same time, we know it can't.
translation.zh: 但是同时我们很清楚它不可能存在

translation.en: So we trick our brains,  because our brain simply doesn't accept the fact  that it doesn't really make sense.
translation.zh: 就这样我们骗了自己的大脑 因为大脑就是不肯接受 这个物体其实并不存在这一事实

translation.en: with combining photographs.
translation.zh: 组合照片

translation.en: It's just really about combining different realities.
translation.zh: 也是如此 确实只是把不同的现实画面组合起来

translation.en: So the things that make a photograph look realistic,  I think it's the things that we don't even think about,  the things all around us in our daily lives.
translation.zh: 所以使一张照片看起来逼真的事物 是那些我们平时甚至不会去想 但在日常生活中随处可见的东西

translation.en: But when combining photographs,  this is really important to consider,  because otherwise it just looks wrong somehow.
translation.zh: 但是当我们组合照片的时候 这点就值得我们着重思考了 否则它看起来就会别扭

translation.en: So I would like to say that there are three simple rules to follow  to achieve a realistic result.
translation.zh: 我想说的是我们要遵守三个简单的原则 为了达到一个逼真的效果

translation.en: As you can see, these images aren't really special.
translation.zh: 你们看，这些图像并不特别

translation.en: But combined, they can create something like this.
translation.zh: 但是组合起来，它们就可以创造出这样的画面

translation.en: So the first rule is that photos combined  should have the same perspective.
translation.zh: 所以第一原则就是所有被组合的照片 都展现同样的视角

translation.en: Secondly, photos combined  should have the same type of light.
translation.zh: 第二，被组合的照片 还要有相同的光线

translation.en: And these two images both fulfill these two requirements --  shot at the same height and in the same type of light.
translation.zh: 这两张照片都符合这两样要求 它们都摄于相同的拍摄高度和相同的光线下

translation.en: The third one is about making it impossible to distinguish  where the different images begin and end  by making it seamless.
translation.zh: 第三个原则是要让人难以分辨 这些不同照片的衔接点 使衔接看起来天衣无缝

translation.en: Make it impossible to say  how the image actually was composed.
translation.zh: 使任何人都道不出 这图片是如何创作而成的

translation.en: So by matching color, contrast and brightness  in the borders between the different images,  adding photographic defects  like depth of field,  desaturated colors and noise,  we erase the borders between the different images  and make it look like one single image,  despite the fact that one image  can contain hundreds of layers basically.
translation.zh: 通过匹配不同照片边缘的 色彩，对比度以及亮度 再加入一下摄影瑕疵 比如视野的深度 去饱和的色彩和噪音 我们可以除去不同照片之间的边界 使其看起来就像是一张单一的照片 即使一张照片 可包含上百个图层

translation.en: So here's another example.
translation.zh: 这里还有一个例子

translation.en: One might think that this is just an image of a landscape  and the lower part is what's manipulated.
translation.zh: 有人可能认为这只是一张风景图 下面的部分是处理过的

translation.en: But this image is actually entirely composed  of photographs from different locations.
translation.zh: 但是这张照片其实整个都是 由不同地方拍摄的很多照片组合起来的

translation.en: I personally think that it's easier to actually create a place  than to find a place,  because then you don't need to compromise  with the ideas in your head.
translation.zh: 我个人认为创造一个地方比找到一个地方 要容易一些 因为你不用 与自己大脑的想法妥协

translation.en: But it does require a lot of planning.
translation.zh: 但是这确实需要很多规划

translation.en: And getting this idea during winter,  I knew that I had several months to plan it,  to find the different locations  for the pieces of the puzzle basically.
translation.zh: 去年冬天产生这个想法时 我知道我有几个月的时间去规划这件事 基本上要到不同的地点 找这一拼图所需的图片

translation.en: So for example,  the fish was captured on a fishing trip.
translation.zh: 比如 这条鱼摄于一次垂钓航行

translation.en: The shores are from a different location.
translation.zh: 海岸拍摄于另一个地点

translation.en: The underwater part was captured in a stone pit.
translation.zh: 水下的部分摄于一个采石场

translation.en: And yeah, I even turned the house on top of the island red  to make it look more Swedish.
translation.zh: 对了，我还把岛上的房子调成红色的了 使它看起来更具瑞典风

translation.en: So to achieve a realistic result,  I think it comes down to planning.
translation.zh: 为了达到一个逼真的效果 我认为最重要的就是规划

translation.en: It always starts with a sketch, an idea.
translation.zh: 总是会先出现一个大概的构思和想法

translation.en: Then it's about combining the different photographs.
translation.zh: 然后就是组合不同的照片

translation.en: And here every piece is very well planned.
translation.zh: 这里每一个图片都是经过仔细规划的

translation.en: And if you do a good job capturing the photos,  the result can be quite beautiful  and also quite realistic.
translation.zh: 如果你能抓拍到很好的照片， 效果会很美。 而且也很逼真

translation.en: So all the tools are out there,  and the only thing that limits us  is our imagination.
translation.zh: 所以其实所有的工具都在那 唯一限制我们的 是我们的想象力

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家

translation.en: Because I usually take the role  of trying to explain to people  how wonderful the new technologies  that are coming along are going to be,  and I thought that, since I was among friends here,  I would tell you what I really think  and try to look back and try to understand  what is really going on here  with these amazing jumps in technology  that seem so fast that we can barely keep on top of it.
translation.zh: 由于我经常 向人们解释 即将到来的新科技 将会多么的美妙 我想既然我跟各位朋友们一起在这 就让我来说说我真正的想法 并试着回顾和理解 这到底是如何发生的 有了这些科技上的惊人进步。 科技的进步似乎快到我们根本无法赶上它的脚步。

translation.en: So I'm going to start out  by showing just one very boring technology slide.
translation.zh: 让我先从这开始 一页很无趣的科技幻灯片。

translation.en: And then, so if you can just turn on the slide that's on.
translation.zh: 然后可以开始放幻灯片了。

translation.en: This is just a random slide  that I picked out of my file.
translation.zh: 这只是我从我的文件中 随机挑选出的一张。

translation.en: What I want to show you is not so much the details of the slide,  but the general form of it.
translation.zh: 我想要你们看的并不是它的细节， 而是它的总体形式。

translation.en: This happens to be a slide of some analysis that we were doing  about the power of RISC microprocessors  versus the power of local area networks.
translation.zh: 这个是我们做的 关于RISC精简指令集微处理器功率 与本地网路功率分析的幻灯片。

translation.en: And the interesting thing about it  is that this slide,  like so many technology slides that we're used to,  is a sort of a straight line  on a semi-log curve.
translation.zh: 有趣的是 这页幻灯片 就像很多我们所熟悉的幻灯片一样， 是半对数曲线图 上的一条直线。

translation.en: In other words, every step here  represents an order of magnitude  in performance scale.
translation.zh: 也就是这里的每一层， 代表了性能程度 大小的一级。

translation.en: And this is a new thing  that we talk about technology  on semi-log curves.
translation.zh: 在半对数曲线图上 讨论科技， 这很新鲜。

translation.en: Something really weird is going on here.
translation.zh: 这其中有点奇特。

translation.en: And that's basically what I'm going to be talking about.
translation.zh: 这基本上是我接下来要说的。

translation.en: So, if you could bring up the lights.
translation.zh: 麻烦开一下灯。

translation.en: If you could bring up the lights higher,  because I'm just going to use a piece of paper here.
translation.zh: 请把灯开亮点， 因为我要用张纸。

translation.en: Now why do we draw technology curves  in semi-log curves?
translation.zh: 为什么我们要用对数曲线 描绘科技曲线呢？

translation.en: Well the answer is, if I drew it on a normal curve  where, let's say, this is years,  this is time of some sort,  and this is whatever measure of the technology  that I'm trying to graph,  the graphs look sort of silly.
translation.zh: 嗯，答案是，如果我用普通曲线画， 我们说，这是年份， 这是某个时间， 这是我准备画的 科技的某种测量值， 这图看起来有点傻。

translation.en: They sort of go like this.
translation.zh: 就有点像是这样。

translation.en: And they don't tell us much.
translation.zh: 而且并没有提供什么资讯。

translation.en: Now if I graph, for instance,  some other technology, say transportation technology,  on a semi-log curve,  it would look very stupid, it would look like a flat line.
translation.zh: 现在，如果我画，比如说， 另一种技术，像是交通运输， 在半对数曲线上， 它看起来很蠢，会像条很平的线。

translation.en: But when something like this happens,  things are qualitatively changing.
translation.zh: 但是如果出现像这种 质变的情况。

translation.en: So if transportation technology  was moving along as fast as microprocessor technology,  then the day after tomorrow,  I would be able to get in a taxi cab  and be in Tokyo in 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 如果交通运输技术 进步地像微处理器技术一样快的话， 那，后天 我就能搭一辆出租车 然后在30秒内到东京。

translation.en: It's not moving like that. And there's nothing precedented  in the history of technology development  of this kind of self-feeding growth  where you go by orders of magnitude every few years.
translation.zh: 但它并没有进步得那么快。 在科技发展历史中 也没有任何 这种自给自足， 每几年程度翻倍增长的先例。

translation.en: Now the question that I'd like to ask is,  if you look at these exponential curves,  they don't go on forever.
translation.zh: 现在我想要问的是， 如果你观察这些指数曲线， 它们并非永远的持续下去。

translation.en: Things just can't possibly keep changing  as fast as they are.
translation.zh: 事物不可能一直 改变得那么快。

translation.en: One of two things is going to happen.
translation.zh: 两件事会发生，

translation.en: Either it's going to turn into a sort of classical S-curve like this,  until something totally different comes along,  or maybe it's going to do this.
translation.zh: 要么它会变成像这样典型的S曲线 直到完全不同的情况出现。 或是会变成这样。

translation.en: That's about all it can do.
translation.zh: 这就是所有可能。

translation.en: Now I'm an optimist,  so I sort of think it's probably going to do something like that.
translation.zh: 现在我是个乐观主义者， 所以我觉得它很有可能就会变成这样。

translation.en: If so, that means that what we're in the middle of right now  is a transition.
translation.zh: 如果是这样，意味着我们目前所在的 是过渡阶段。

translation.en: We're sort of on this line  in a transition from the way the world used to be  to some new way that the world is.
translation.zh: 我们似乎在这条线上， 在世界从过去 到将来的转变中。

translation.en: And so what I'm trying to ask, what I've been asking myself,  is what's this new way that the world is?
translation.zh: 所有我要问的，我一直在问自己的， 就是这世界未来道路在哪？

translation.en: What's that new state that the world is heading toward?
translation.zh: 它趋向的新时代是什么样的？

translation.en: Because the transition seems very, very confusing  when we're right in the middle of it.
translation.zh: 由于这个变化似乎非常，非常迷惑人， 当我们正处于其中时。

translation.en: Now when I was a kid growing up,  the future was kind of the year 2000,  and people used to talk about what would happen in the year 2000.
translation.zh: 我小时候，在长大过程中 未来就像是2000年， 人们都在讨论2000年将会发生什么。

translation.en: Now here's a conference  in which people talk about the future,  and you notice that the future is still at about the year 2000.
translation.zh: 现在这个会议上， 大家在讨论未来， 而且你能发现这未来指的还是那个“2000年”。

translation.en: It's about as far as we go out.
translation.zh: 这就是我们能达到的程度。

translation.en: So in other words, the future has kind of been shrinking  one year per year  for my whole lifetime.
translation.zh: 换句话说，在我一生中 未来正在 逐年缩短。

translation.en: Now I think that the reason  is because we all feel  that something's happening there.
translation.zh: 我想原因是 我们都感觉到 正在发生些什么。

translation.en: That transition is happening. We can all sense it.
translation.zh: 变化正在发生。我们都能察觉到。

translation.en: And we know that it just doesn't make too much sense  to think out 30, 50 years  because everything's going to be so different  that a simple extrapolation of what we're doing  just doesn't make any sense at all.
translation.zh: 我们知道去考虑那未来的三、五十年 已经没什么意义了， 因为每件事都将如此不同 以至于推测将来 不再有意义。

translation.en: So what I would like to talk about  is what that could be,  what that transition could be that we're going through.
translation.zh: 所以我要聊聊 那会是怎样， 我们正在经历的转变会是怎样。

translation.en: Now in order to do that  I'm going to have to talk about a bunch of stuff  that really has nothing to do  with technology and computers.
translation.zh: 为达到这个目的， 我得介绍一堆东西 它们与 科技和电脑完全无关。

translation.en: Because I think the only way to understand this  is to really step back  and take a long time scale look at things.
translation.zh: 因为我决定理解这个的唯一方法 就是回顾过去 拉长时间轴去看。

translation.en: So the time scale that I would like to look at this on  is the time scale of life on Earth.
translation.zh: 而我所要看的时间轴 是以地球上生命的时间跨度来看。

translation.en: So I think this picture makes sense  if you look at it a few billion years at a time.
translation.zh: 我想这幅图合理了 如果你每次从几十亿年跨度来看。

translation.en: So if you go back  about two and a half billion years,  the Earth was this big, sterile hunk of rock  with a lot of chemicals floating around on it.
translation.zh: 所以如果你回溯个 大概25亿年， 地球这么大，贫瘠的大块石头 上面浮着些化学物质。

translation.en: And if you look at the way  that the chemicals got organized,  we begin to get a pretty good idea of how they do it.
translation.zh: 要是观察 这些化学物质怎样组合的， 我们开始弄明白它们怎么形成的。

translation.en: And I think that there's theories that are beginning to understand  about how it started with RNA,  but I'm going to tell a sort of simple story of it,  which is that, at that time,  there were little drops of oil floating around  with all kinds of different recipes of chemicals in them.
translation.zh: 我想有些理论是从理解 生命怎样从核糖核酸演变开始， 但是我想讲一个生命的简单故事， 就是，在那个时候， 有一滴滴的油四处浮动， 里面有各种不同化学成分组合。

translation.en: And some of those drops of oil  had a particular combination of chemicals in them  which caused them to incorporate chemicals from the outside  and grow the drops of oil.
translation.zh: 有些油滴 里面含有特殊的化学构成 这导致它们可以从外界聚集化学物质 并慢慢变大。

translation.en: And those that were like that  started to split and divide.
translation.zh: 像这样的油滴 又开始分化，分离。

translation.en: And those were the most primitive forms of cells in a sense,  those little drops of oil.
translation.zh: 最原始的那些在某种程度上形成了细胞， 这些小小的油滴。

translation.en: But now those drops of oil weren't really alive, as we say it now,  because every one of them  was a little random recipe of chemicals.
translation.zh: 但目前为止这些油滴不是真正活着的，在我们现在看来， 因为每一个 都是化学物质的随机合成。

translation.en: And every time it divided,  they got sort of unequal division  of the chemicals within them.
translation.zh: 每分裂一次， 都不是平均分布 内部的化学物。

translation.en: And so every drop was a little bit different.
translation.zh: 所以每个油滴都有点不同。

translation.en: In fact, the drops that were different in a way  that caused them to be better  at incorporating chemicals around them,  grew more and incorporated more chemicals and divided more.
translation.zh: 实际上，油滴不同的方式 是让它们能更好地 集成周围的化合物， 长得更大，吸收更多，分裂更多。

translation.en: So those tended to live longer,  get expressed more.
translation.zh: 所以它们会活得更长， 表现得更多。

translation.en: Now that's sort of just a very simple  chemical form of life,  but when things got interesting  was when these drops  learned a trick about abstraction.
translation.zh: 这就有点像个很简单的 生命的化学形式， 但过程变得有趣 是当这些油滴 学会了一个提供资讯的技巧时。

translation.en: Somehow by ways that we don't quite understand,  these little drops learned to write down information.
translation.zh: 不知怎么用我们不能完全理解的方式， 这些小油滴学会了记录资讯。

translation.en: They learned to record the information  that was the recipe of the cell  onto a particular kind of chemical  called DNA.
translation.zh: 它们学会把 细胞形成的秘诀 记录到一种特殊物质上， 叫做去氧核糖核酸。

translation.en: So in other words, they worked out,  in this mindless sort of evolutionary way,  a form of writing that let them write down what they were,  so that that way of writing it down could get copied.
translation.zh: 也就是说，它们想出了， 以这种随性的进化方式， 可以写下它们基因信息的记录方式， 以便这种记录方式能被复制。

translation.en: The amazing thing is that that way of writing  seems to have stayed steady  since it evolved two and a half billion years ago.
translation.zh: 惊奇的是这种记录方式 似乎可以保持稳定 由于它25亿年前演化出来的。

translation.en: In fact the recipe for us, our genes,  is exactly that same code and that same way of writing.
translation.zh: 实际上我们，我们基因的组成 就是完全一样的代码，一样的记录方式。

translation.en: In fact, every living creature is written  in exactly the same set of letters and the same code.
translation.zh: 实际上，任何生物都是 用完全一样的字母和代码记录下来的。

translation.en: In fact, one of the things that I did  just for amusement purposes  is we can now write things in this code.
translation.zh: 实际上，我所做的 仅是为了娱乐效果的一件事 就是我们能用这个代码记录事件。

translation.en: And I've got here a little 100 micrograms of white powder,  which I try not to let the security people see at airports.
translation.zh: 我这有100微克的白粉， 我尽力不让机场安检人员发现它们。

translation.en: But this has in it --  what I did is I took this code --  the code has standard letters that we use for symbolizing it --  and I wrote my business card onto a piece of DNA  and amplified it 10 to the 22 times.
translation.zh: 不过这里面有代码 我所做的是我拿着这代码 它里面有我们用来标记它的标准字母， 然后我把我的名片写到一条去氧核糖核酸上 再放大10到22倍。
